name: CTFontDescriptorMatchingState
desc: Constants that track the progress of font descriptor matching.

items.name: case didBegin
items.desc: A state that indicates matching is about to begin.

items.name: case didFinish
items.desc: A state that indicates matching is done.

items.name: case willBeginQuerying
items.desc: A state that indicates communication with the server is about to begin.

items.name: case stalled
items.desc: A state that indicates that matching is stalled, such as while waiting for a server response.

items.name: case willBeginDownloading
items.desc: A state that indicates downloading is about to begin.

items.name: case downloading
items.desc: A state that indicates downloading is in progress.

items.name: case didFinishDownloading
items.desc: A state that indicates downloading is done.

items.name: case didMatch
items.desc: A state that indicates the font descriptor match is successful.

items.name: case didFailWithError
items.desc: A state that indicates an error.
